commitResults.messageTitle: Level-0
Revert "Level-0"
commitResults.messageBody: This reverts commit a48260df3d6e74ea4c8a1a6df41a356fe6749910.

commitResults.messageTitle: -Added greeting message -Added shutdown message
-Changed name of file to be the same as bot name -Added echo function -Added shutdown function
-Added function to remember commands (up to 100 commands) -Added function for "list" command

-Removed unused Duke.java file -Added Task class (Task.java) -Added function for "mark" -Added function for "unmark" -Changed "list" to use Task class -Changed ASCII art to static final variables -Changed "add" function to use Task class
-Fixed formatting for ASCII art
-Fixed not taking in mulitple words
-Fixed program crashing when using mark command with a string
-Changed if-else statements to switch-case statements
Added: Child classes of "Task" for Level-4
commitResults.messageBody:
Added: Support for "Deadline", "Event", "ToDo"

Improved: Flavour text

Fixed: Bugs involving "mark" and "unmark" cases

Fixed: Constants not having uppercase names

Added: Divider to each reply from the bot

Added: There is now a toString overload function in "Task"

Added: Type is now tracked in "Task"

Changed: Default case no longer adds a task, instead it prompts the user again

Changed: "Task" no longer used as a standalone type

Fixed: Error message no longer print out multiple times when an invalid input is typed

commitResults.messageTitle: Changed: Name of .java file back to Duke to prevent script errors
commitResults.messageBody: Tried: Ran runtest.bat and changed EXPECTED to expected output and added input test case

commitResults.messageTitle: Added: DukeException for error handing
commitResults.messageBody:
Changed: Made ASCII art smaller

Changed: Existing error checking now uses exceptions

commitResults.messageTitle: Fixed: Removed bugs caused by new error handing
Changed: ASCII goodbye art;
